job.title: Product Manager
job.description:
Our mobile and internet app has completely the modernized the costly and time-consuming century old automobile fuel supply chain, in allowing the average person, office park, or any fleet of vehicles to conveniently refuel without having to move a muscle.
With nearly 90MM in funding and $180k daily revenue. Our customers span from the automotive industry with Mercedes Benz to the consumer goods industry with Walmart. With our massive market cap we are rapidly scaling to meet demand and looking to add a Staff Software Engineer to assist on Delivery Product strategy and roadmap, based on users insights and provide new concepts and work flows to increase safety and efficiency.
We are looking to add top of the industry talent to our team and with your experience it could be an ideal fit, let me know if you're interested in a discussion about it
What You Will Be Doing
Work with design and engineering team to solve any and all problems
Work on product initiatives to improve customer experience
What You Need for this Position
A minimum of 4 years of experience working with b2b or Saas software
Experience building a product from start to finish
Experience working with a software engineering team
So, if you are a Product Manager with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Nitu.Gulati-Pauly@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : LP8-1623857 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Nitu Gulati-Pauly - VP of Recruiting - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
